# Screen Award for Best Actor (Critics)

The Star Screen Award for Best Actor (Critics) is an Indian cinema award.
Winners

| 2007 || Sanjay Dutt || Lage Raho Munna Bhai

| 2019 || Gajraj Rao || Badhaai Ho
